title: Auto-refresh board
description:
Automatic board refresh:
- Poll /api/ticks every 5 seconds
- htmx hx-trigger='every 5s'
- Only update if data changed (ETag or hash)
- Preserve open detail panel on refresh
- Visual indicator when refreshing
acceptance_criteria:
